segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the center-left of the room now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy attempting quite a feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's climbing on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I can clearly see a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yes, it's filled to the brim with cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, like a catcher's mitt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed and it seems to be tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so high, I worry he might lose his balance any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic secret cookie mission, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risk of him falling is making me really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He really needs to be careful up there.
segments.speaker: PAR
